hey all, does anyone know how I could execute dinamic tests methods using
Junit? I mean, I have a framework that uses xml configuration and XPATH to
make some assertion tests from our server, and I would like to run them
using junit, as it would be easier to generate reports and so on. The
problem is that the tests are dinamic and depend on an external
configuration file. So if i do asserts inside a loop it would leave the
method on the first fail/error, is there any way to store all the asserts
and process them afterwards? what would you suggest?

thanks
emerson

-- 
Emerson Cargnin
